text: <@U0ML49XU0> <@U02E3CRMA> I’d like to start getting some of the tasks Mo and John are working on into JIRA for better planning and visibility. Any thoughts on how we should go about this? thinking that we might not want to use the existing BL Wall Build project
<@U02E3CRMA> <@U0ML49XU0> let me know what you think, if you got a board set up or need some help
let’s do a separate board for all the late-2016 stuff

<@U02E3CRMA> just came by to discuss with me.  sounds like 
a) leia spin board up
b) dennis to give you overview of our workflow
c) joel to seed tasks with what ppl are already working on
since it’s partly follow-up on the original wall, and part tools/capabilities prep
who is ‘you’ in: b) dennis to give you overview of our workflow
since leia can set up the board
ok i’m not as skilled at jira-fu as i remember so dennis is gonna help me set it up monday a.m.
